openGraph.ogTitle: Product is Hard by Marty Cagan
openGraph.ogDescription: We are all learning how to manage product in the internet age. There have been many successes and failures, and there are still lots more to come. Marty Cagan has worked at plenty of internet successes and failures, including eBay, Netscape and HP. He now heads up Silicon Valley Product Group, where he works with [...] Read more »

openGraph.ogTitle: Getting out from the Valley of Despair in product
openGraph.ogDescription: In this guest post, Sharon Feldstein, Head of Product at Affogata, discusses the journey of creating a new product, and how we can avoid falling into the Valley of Despair, a common problem that many product managers face.

openGraph.ogTitle: Market Fit - Silicon Valley Product Group
openGraph.ogDescription: By Martina Lauchengco The Market Side of Product/Market Fit I see so many companies find an initial beachhead of customers, think they have product/market fit, and then find their growth stalling. It’s never about just one thing. But it’s often because not enough attention was paid to market fit. Discovering the product and its market...

openGraph.ogTitle: All product management should be focused on growth by Partho Ghosh
openGraph.ogDescription: In this #mtpcon SF+Americas 2022 breakout session, Partho Ghosh, Senior Director of Product, Growth at Hootsuite, looks at why all product management should revolve around growth. Watch this video or read on for key highlights from the talk.
